briefdescription.para: If true dropout and scaling is disabled, see notes above.
To know whether this object allocated memory.

detaileddescription.para: We need this to know whether we should delete the metric member variable in the destructor.

briefdescription.para: Number of steps to backpropagate through time (BPTT).
Default constructorthis will create a Recurrent object that can't be used, so be careful! Make sure to set all the parameters before use.

memberdef.argsstring: (const StartModuleType &start, const InputModuleType &input, const FeedbackModuleType &feedback, const TransferModuleType &transfer, const size_t rho)
memberdef.name: Recurrent

briefdescription.para: Create the Recurrent object using the specified modules.

parameterdescription.para: Maximum number of steps to backpropagate through time (BPTT).

memberdef.argsstring: (const arma::Mat< eT > &, const arma::Mat< eT > &gy, arma::Mat< eT > &g)
memberdef.name: Backward

briefdescription.para: Ordinary feed backward pass of a neural network, calculating the function f(x) by propagating x backwards trough f.

detaileddescription.para: Using the results from the feed forward pass.

briefdescription.para: Modify the value of the deterministic parameter.
The value of the deterministic parameter.
Ordinary feed forward pass of a neural network, evaluating the function f(x) by propagating the activity forward through f.

parameterdescription.para: Input data used for evaluating the specified function.

memberdef.argsstring: (const arma::Mat< eT > &input, const arma::Mat< eT > &error, arma::Mat< eT > &)
memberdef.name: Gradient

briefdescription.para: Get the shape of the input.
Get the number of steps to backpropagate through time.

detaileddescription.para: Recurrent layers can be used similarly to feed-forward layers.

parameterdescription.para: Type of the input data (arma::colvec, arma::mat, arma::sp_mat or arma::cube).
Type of the output data (arma::colvec, arma::mat, arma::sp_mat or arma::cube).
